message_catalog.msg:
Your account is currently closed.

If you wish, we can reopen your account.
Your account is currently closed. Log in again to see what you can do about it.
Your account at %system_name% has been reopened. Welcome back.
Retrieving password from local authority is not supported.

Please confirm that you would like to close your account at %system_name%.

Closing your account means that we will no longer send you email notifications, nor will you show up in lists of members at %system_name%. Your contributions to the community, however, will be preserved, as they're part of the community's history.

Note that you may reopen your account at any time, siply by logging in again.
Your online status is currently not visible to other users.
Your online status is currently visible to other users.

%first_names% %last_name%,
You have been added as a user to %system_name% at %system_url%
Here's how you can log in at %system_url%:
%account_id_label%: %account_id% %password_label%: %password%
Please visit the following link to change your password now:
%reset_password_url%
Thank you, %admin_first_names% %admin_last_name%

Here is your new login information:
%account_id_label%: %account_id% %password_label%: %password%
Please visit the following link to change your password now:
%reset_password_url%

Thank you for registering at %system_name%.
Here's how you can log in at %system_url%:
%account_id_label%: %account_id% %password_label%: %password%
Please visit the following link to change your password now:
%reset_password_url%
You have been added as a user to %system_name%

Here is your new login information:
%account_id_label%: %account_id% %password_label%: %password%
Please visit the following link to change your password:
%reset_password_url%
The login page has expired. Please
Couldn't find user %user_id%. This is probably a bug in our code.
Couldn't find your record" "User id %user_id% is not in the database. This is probably our programming bug.
In Netscape 4.0, you can enable cookies from Edit -> Preferences -> Advanced. In Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0, you can enable cookies from View -> Internet Options -> Advanced -> Security.
for a period of vacation or permanently
for future reference, please type in a question and an answer to use as verification.
For security reasons, the login page expires after a certain interval to prevent malicious attackers from logging in as you using previously entered passwords.
If you have a Web site, we'll be able to point searchers there.
If you want to check what other users of this service are shown, visit %member_link%
If you're getting too much email from us
If you've forgotten your password, you can ask this server to reset your password and email a new randomly generated password to you.

In general we identify content that you've posted by your full name. In an attempt to protect you from unsolicited bulk email (spam), we keep your email address hidden except from other registered users. Total privacy is technically feasible but an important element of an online community is that people can learn from each other. So we try to make it possible for users with common interests to contact each other.
It would be a very bad idea to choose this option if you're using a shared computer in a library or school. Any subsequent user of this machine would be able to masquerade as you on our service.
Leading or trailing spaces will be removed by the server. Don't obsess too much over your choice of password; if you forget it, our server will offer to email it to you.

If you keep getting thrown back here, it is probably because your browser does not accept cookies. We're sorry for the inconvenience but it really is impossible to program a system like this without keeping track of who is posting what.
Note: If you've forgotten your password, <a href="@email_password_url@">ask this server to email it to %email%
Note: If you've forgotten your password, <a href="email-password?user_id=%user_id%">ask this server to email it to %email%
Note that you can erase your saved email address and password by choosing the "log out" option from your workspace.
Now we're really in trouble because we got this error:

Our server can tell your browser to remember certain things, such as your email address and password. This is convenient for you because, if you're the only person who uses your computer, you won't have to keep telling us your email address and password.
Please check your inbox. Within the next few minutes, you should find a message from %system_owner% containing your password.
Please enter your email and password below.

Please follow the following link to reset your password:
%reset_password_url%
Please read and follow the instructions in this email.
Please try to log in again
Please verify your identity by providing the information below:
Registration information for this service has just been sent to %email%.
Registration information for this service has been sent to %email%.
Your registration request has been submitted to the %system_name% administrator. It is still waiting approval.
Row id %row_id% is not in the database. Please check your email and verifiy that you have cut and pasted the url correctly.
Show everyone else at %system_name% how great looking you are:
Sorry but it seems that you've been banned from %system_name%.

Thank you for visiting %system_name%.
Here's how you can log in at %system_url%:
Username: %email% Password: %password%
The full name given didn't match. There must be something wrong.
The password you typed doesn't match what we have in the database. If you think you made a typo, please back up using your browser and try again.
The passwords you've entered don't match.
The validation didn't match what we had. Either press back on the browser and retype it in, or go back to the login page.
Then come back to the login page and use %system_name%.
There was a problem with authenticating your account
This feature is disabled on this server.
To confirm your registration, please go to %confirmation_url%
User id %user_id% is not in the awaiting approval state. This is probably our programming bug.
User id %user_id% is not found in the need email verification state.
User id %user_id% is not in the database. This is probably our programming bug.
User id %user_id% is not in the database. This is probably out programming bug.
We also need a customized question and answer to reset your password if you forget.
We got the following error message while trying to create this relation:
We know your email address already: "%email%". But we need your full name to generate certain kinds of user interface.
We need a password from you to protect your identity as you contribute to the Q&A, discussion forums, and other community activities on this site.
We were not awaiting your email. There must be some mistake.
We were unable to create your user record in the database.
We will generate and send to you a random password when your registration is confirmed. Once you login, you can change your password.

Welcome to %system_name%. Please begin the registration process by entering a valid email address and a password for signing into the system. We will direct you to another form to complete your registration.
What other people see when they click your name
What we tell other users about you
when trying to send you the following email:
When you get your email, go back to the login page and use %system_name%.
You can log in now using your old password:
You can't have a < in your first name because it will look like an HTML tag and confuse other users.
You can't have a < in your last name because it will look like an HTML tag and confuse other users.
You have encountered a problem with authentication.
You have encountered a problem with authentication
Your email has been confirmed. You may now log into %system_name%.
Your email has been confirmed. You are now awaiting approval from the %system_name% administrator.
Your URL doesn't have the correct form. A valid URL would be something like "%valid_url_example%".

Your login information on %system_name%:
%account_id_label%: %account_id%
Your password for this account has recently been changed. You don't need to do anything, this message is simply a notification to protect the security of your account.
---------------
You can always change your password by doing the following:
1. Log in to %system_name%
2. Click on the "%pvt_home_name%" link
3. Choose "%password_update_link_text%"

Thank you for registering for %system_name%. An administrator has been notified of your request.

Once you're approved, you'll get an email message and you can return to start using %system_name%.
Sorry, we can't help you with your forgotten password.
